section.heading: Quarterly report on status of Medicaid eligibility.
section.text: Beginning February 1, 2012, the Department shall issue quarterly reports on the status of the Money Follows the Person program. The report shall include the following:

para.text: The number of applications submitted for Medicaid;
The number of applications approved for Medicaid; and
The amount of money obtained from Medicaid.

annotations.annotation: The 2012 amendment by D.C. Law 19-171 clarified that D.C. Law 19-21, § 5064, added D.C. Law 15-335, § 106a; and substituted “the Department shall” for “DYRS shall” in the introductory language.
